data.message: Hello, can anybody help me, is there a draw wherein you chose 20 facebook users randomly and wherein they each win  600,000 dollars ? Im one of the winners, i have been informed, is this a legitimate winning by facebook?

replies.message: Hey Roselle, this looks like a hoax. We recommend that you don't provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1QxigxV. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Nancy
can help me video like need10000
Someone applied to be my friend that had Facebook and Lottery in their profile.  I did NOT approve her because I don't want to encourage gambling ...
